mapper.insert: INSERT INTO qg_order_temp ( userId, stockId, orderNo, goodsId, num, amount, STATUS, aliTradeNo, createdTime, updatedTime ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{stockId}, #{orderNo}, #{goodsId}, #{num}, #{amount}, #{status}, #{aliTradeNo}, #{createdTime}, #{updatedTime} );

INSERT INTO qg_order ( id, userId, stockId, orderNo, goodsId, num, amount, STATUS, aliTradeNo, createdTime, updatedTime ) SELECT id, userId, stockId, orderNo, goodsId, num, amount, STATUS, aliTradeNo, createdTime, updatedTime From qg_order_temp WHERE id =#{id}
